name: MUXar
tagline: Musical UX Smart Enhancer, project, infoiasi, wade, web
body:
# MUXar  
Musical UX Smart Enhancer

![NodeJS](https://nodejs.org/static/images/logos/js-black.svg)
![AngularJS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/angular/angular.js/master/images/logo/AngularJS-Shield.exports/AngularJS-Shield-small.png)
![RDF](http://www.w3.org/Icons/SW/sw-horz-w3c.png)

##Application architecture
***
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catalin-/muxar/master/docs/general%20architecture.png)  

##Diagrams  
***
**Activity diagram**  
![Activity diagram](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/catalin-/muxar/master/docs/diagrams/activity_diagram.png)  

##External services
***  
**External services used to get media information:**
* [Spotify](https://developer.spotify.com/)  
* [MusicBrainz](https://musicbrainz.org/)
* [seevl.fm](https://developer.seevl.fm)  

###Spotify  
**Documentation**  
[API](https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/endpoint-reference/)  
[API-TUTORIAL](https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/code-examples/#web-api-tutorial)

**Examples**  
Get list of featured playlists: https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/get-list-featured-playlists/  
Get list of new releases: https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/get-list-new-releases/  
Get a list of categories: https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/get-list-categories/  
Get a category's playlists: https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/get-categorys-playlists/  

###MusicBrainz  
**Documentation**  
[XML API](https://musicbrainz.org/doc/Development/XML_Web_Service/Version_2)  
[JSON API](https://musicbrainz.org/doc/Development/JSON_Web_Service)  
[Database Scema](https://musicbrainz.org/doc/MusicBrainz_Database/Schema)  

**Examples**  
Search indexs: artist, release, release-group, recording, work, label  

Generic search:  http\://musicbrainz.org/ws/2/<search_index>/?query=<[lucene_query_syntax](https://lucene.apache.org/core/4_3_0/queryparser/org/apache/lucene/queryparser/classic/package-summary.html#package_description)>
* Search Romanian releases http://musicbrainz.org/ws/2/release/?query=country:ro
* Search areas http://musicbrainz.org/ws/2/area/?query=iasi  

###seevl.fm
seevl is a graph of music entities. Entities are identified by a unique URI (together with a short version, recorded as an ID), and can have different types, such as artist, record label, music genre, etc. They have different properties (influences, genres played, band members,etc.) and are inter-connected through relationships.  

**Documentation**  
[API](https://developer.seevl.fm/docs)  

**Examples**  
100 entities playing punk-rock: http://data.seevl.fm/entities/?genre=BntvuZAy&_maxres=100  
All entities playing punk-rock and signed on Epitaph Records: http://data.seevl.fm/entities/?genre=BntvuZAy&label=B3ZFtGrJ  
Entities (artists) related to Social Distortion: http://data.seevl.fm/entities/RkMQZrfG/related  
Entities (groups) related to Glam-rock: http://data.seevl.fm/entities/JhMrUMw9/related
